scripts.dev: NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=development CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true CHOKIDAR_INTERVAL=500 WATCHPACK_POLLING=true WATCHPACK_AGGREGATE_TIMEOUT=200 next dev -p 3000
scripts.dev:https: NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=development CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true CHOKIDAR_INTERVAL=500 WATCHPACK_POLLING=true WATCHPACK_AGGREGATE_TIMEOUT=200 next dev --experimental-https -p 3000
scripts.dev:debug: dev3000 --port 3000 --script 'NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=development CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true CHOKIDAR_INTERVAL=500 WATCHPACK_POLLING=true WATCHPACK_AGGREGATE_TIMEOUT=200 next dev'
scripts.dev:debug:https: dev3000 --port 3000 --script 'NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=development CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true CHOKIDAR_INTERVAL=500 WATCHPACK_POLLING=true WATCHPACK_AGGREGATE_TIMEOUT=200 next dev --experimental-https'
